attributes.contentHtml:
So a while back I made a post about SkyCastle Hosting. Well prepare to get your eyes deep fried for the amount of dumb stuff since that post that has happened.
So he has raided both SkyCastle and Ectrix Host. Also attempted to raid Sway host in the process but failed.
Also thinks that deleting messages can save him from getting reported to discord. Has transferred his vps more times than I can count because he offers it to a small host and then raids followed by yeeting a fuck ton of user data. Also makes fake therts and then deletes them because of how scared he is. Also somehow thinks he can make a good winterhoax. Also uses contabo. So yeah there are probably some things I am missing.
Current tag is
@᲼᲼᲼᲼᲼᲼#0707
And his ID is 665956339033309203 in case he changes it because that how they try and hide
